paragraphs.text: A clear path, waiting for shifty feet to tread weary ways —everyday a new trial, a new tribulation; I am tired of following, I want to lead.
paragraphs.name: 62ce

paragraphs.text: Follows

Amazed they belong to her,
she controls them,
 
curls each finger, notes
how each joint works,
paragraphs.name: 61fa

paragraphs.text:
finger of one hand follows
lines of the other
 
as if to remap, retraverse
landscapes of age.
paragraphs.name: f143

content.subtitle:
Amazed they belong to her,
she controls them,
 
curls each finger, notes
how each joint works,

virtuals.subtitle:

she controls them,
 
curls each finger, notes
how each joint works,

d6bb22f0c140.title: I love this one, especially that last line. Here’s my go at it…

paragraphs.text: I love this one, especially that last line. Here’s my go at it…
paragraphs.name: 3f05

paragraphs.text: It feels like death to walk away, obliteration of the spirit; but still I do it, still I do it moments after you say hello…
paragraphs.name: cb56

paragraphs.text: It came [to me] at the most appropriate time when encouragement and insight was much needed to keep pace with such mentors as the Christ & Buddha; where the footprints not only impress the earth beneath their feet, but also change the whole landscape, and affect the way it is seen!

paragraphs.name: dea9

paragraphs.text: and gladly I follow, I gallop to reach her, I gallop to hold her,
paragraphs.name: ac8f

paragraphs.text: Oh, I follow, I follow with every straining stride,
paragraphs.name: da26

paragraphs.text: She has my heart in her hand, follow I must, follow I will, follow I shall.

Somewhere beyond the city far
from the din of traffic and fading 
howls of street…
paragraphs.name: 1d82

e7ad23b522dc.title: She left her scent in the night air,

paragraphs.text: She left her scent in the night air,
paragraphs.name: c17d

paragraphs.text: hoping it would linger and touch me,
my love for her transcends any need of hope,
paragraphs.name: c9db

paragraphs.text: where she leads, I must follow, she has all that I am,
I must follow her for she is life itself, life unchained.

content.subtitle: hoping it would linger and touch me,
